channel.title: Please HELP ME!

item.title: Please HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @Ironclad722 Ironclad722
item.description:
@Ironclad722 wrote:

you basically need the getItemSlot() method, if this is for 317, which i dont think it is,

public int getItemSlot(int itemID) { for (int slot = 0; slot < playerItems.length; slot++) { if (playerItems[slot] == (itemID + 1)) { return slot; } } return -1; }
